text: 4.5 Apo 21.8, Epe 4.11, 2 Ti 1.8, 2.3 Nad ke pen, nep tap tɨtay dɨnɨgab ak, gos nɨgtep gɨlɨg yenɨmɨn. Mɨŋel gɨl yɨpɨl gonɨmuŋ, gos awl anɨb ak ma nɨgɨnɨmɨn. Takaw teplep wog ak gɨl, binɨb kɨli Klays ma nepal okok kɨlop gɨtep gɨl agñɨnɨmɨn. Pen God nep agek wog ne okok dɨpan ak, wog anɨb ak kɨles gɨl gɨtep gɨnɨmɨn.
